channel.title: Need someone to teach me how to create hamachi server (lol)
channel.description: Ok well since Its not working im gonna use hamachi so can someone explain how I set hamachi up please I have it downloaded now I need to know how to get people to connect.

item.title: Need someone to teach me how to create hamachi server (lol)
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

I’m not saying you can’t use it, but hamachi gave me a virus once.

So i’m just giving you a heads up that it’s not safe so I highly recommand you don’t use it!

Thanks,

~Armo
